original_text: Unto an hundred talents of silver, and to an hundred measures of wheat, and to an hundred baths of wine, and to an hundred baths of oil, and salt without prescribing how much.
korean_text: 은은 백 달란트까지, 밀은 백 고르까지, 포도주는 백 밧까지, 기름도 백 밧까지 하고 소금은 정량 없이 하라

sentences.original_text: Unto an hundred talents of silver
and to an hundred measures of wheat
and to an hundred baths of wine
and to an hundred baths of oil
and salt without prescribing how much
sentences.korean_translation: 그 양을 정하지 아니한 소금을 주어
